description: This file is an HTML document that includes a script defining a Calculator class extending Service, registering methods, and establishing a connection to a service manager. It is used for client-side scripting in a web context, implementing a remote service interaction.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A JavaScript class extending Service that provides 'add' and 'sub' methods for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Calculates the sum of parameters and returns the result as a Promise.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Calculates the difference between the first two parameters and returns the result as a Promise.
